transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan Priyanka mam.
Executive: Hi good afternoon sir.
Customer: Nothing good bolo.
Executive: Um.
Customer: Manti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Bolo bolo fatafat bolo matter kya hai wo.
Executive: Haan sir wo maine aapki servicing ke regarding hi call kiya tha aapne complaint raise kari thi ki aapko buyleads vagera ka issue aa raha hai kuch.
Customer: To samjha diya Priyanka mam ko 10 baar bol diya yaar IndiaMART ki sari team ya to aa jao sabko ek ek baar explain karna padega kya.
Executive: Okay okay Priyanka mam abhi call kar lengi fir aapko.
Customer: Haan mujhe call nahi karna hai mujhe call karke kyu kar rahe ho bhai call.
Customer: Problem hai uska solution dhundo.
Executive: Problem to sir just.
Executive: Problem to maine aapki samajh li sir but vahi vali cheez hai na ye wo to sir verify aapko karna padega and it is.
Customer: Are mam hame verify karna hota to hum IndiaMART ko jhak maar ke paisa dete hamara time bachane ke liye to wo kar rahe hai varna kya Google my lead mein vaha pe option nahi hai vaha pe promotion karne ka boost karne ka post se ek minute mein hazaro buylead hazaro aa jate hai message.
Customer: Mujhe agar verified karke hi to lena hai.
Customer: Mere paas mein itna hai nahi staff tak aakar tak mana karta hai IndiaMART kaha le liya yaar experience sab dusri company mein kaam karte the wo log vaha pe unhone paanch paanch chhah chhah saal IndiaMART pe hi kaam kiya hai vaha pe sirf call attend karne ka kaam karte the madam ji vaha pe aur wo madam mere paas aakar teen saal se kaam kar raha hai wo keh raha hai sir maine chhah saal vahi kaam kiya kuch nahi mila.
Customer: Jis company ne use rakha tha madam ko us company ne uski salary bhi di ho bahut achchi baat hai unhone ye bola hai reply mein.
Customer: Aur unka kaam yahi tha bas B2B portal se jo call aa rahi hai wo call attend karke unko baat karke convince karna.
Customer: Lekin convince kare kaise jo 2% positive hai baki to aise hi hai retail wale batao kaise karenge wo madam bhi.
Customer: Aap bologe 100 aapka to kaam hi vahi hai mam call pe baitho aur baatein karo lekin wo sari cheeze sabke liye cheeze nahi hai na.
Customer: Aur sabke liye hi cheeze to fir mam rehne do koi sense hi nahi hai kyuki aisa pay karne ke baad mein bhi agar sirf fake buylead generate karni hai to fir mam pay hi kyu karna.
Customer: Time bhi waste karo aur 100 mein se ek ya do din final ho usse badhiya to nahi karo na ek do deal se hota hi kya hai mujhe ye batao kyu itna time vaha laga rahe isse badhiya to yaha pe koi client aa raha hai usko time de do wo apna business karke dega 100% jayega.
Customer: To fir online mein mam raha kya mujhe ye batao ek hi buylead ko 10 logo ko de diya usme bhi wo buylead fake hoti hai 100 buylead hai 100 ID fake usme se do ya teen positive teen positive usme bhi wo 500 logo ko bikti hai aapne 100 10 15 jano ko share kar di.
Executive: Ji ji ji mai bilkul samajhti hu aap.
Customer: Matlab kya hai mam.
Customer: Sense hi nahi hai na fir wo to hum to aapko bol rahe hai hum aapko kya keh rahe hai mam mere ko buylead nahi chahiye aapko 10 baar bol diya mere ko 17 buylead mat do mere ko saat hi do 10 meri taraf se free mein rakho mai khud chhod raha hu meri taraf se rakho aap aap khush karo mauj karo 10 buylead na do mai le hi nahi raha hu mujhe chahiye bhi nahi mujhe saat hi do bas verified do meri shart itni to hai aap buylead ki quantity kyu badha rahe ho mujhe samajh mein nahi aa raha hai kyu kya fake buylead generate kar rahe ho ya fir wo fake aa rahi hai isliye aap uska pura ka pura uska samarthan kar rahe ho mai aapko yahi to keh raha hu aap 36 ki jagah 63 le lo aap payment double kar do aap bhali buylead 17 ki jagah saat de do hum khush hai lekin verified do bas hamari maang itni hai bhali specially hamare liye karoge to bhi chalega.
Customer: Kyuki mam time ki aapke paas value nahi hai to hame bas wo maza nahi hai fir wo.
Executive: Ji mai bilkul samajh rahi hu mai bilkul samajh rahi hu sir mai sir aapki baat but dekhiye aap jo mere senior sir aapko call karne ka try kar rahe hai aap unka call answer nahi kar rahe ho sir.
Customer: Mam unknown number mai kisi ka nahi uthata mam bahut itne log phone karte hai aap pucho hi mat isliye mai khud hi number change kar liye maine teen mahine ho gaye number hi change kar liye.
Executive: Sir aapki baat bilkul thik hai mai aapki baat se bilkul samajhti hu but abhi agar wo just aapko call karte hai to to aap receive kar sakte ho na sir.
Customer: Mam mai aapko batau dekho unknown number se HDFC bank ICICI bank wale credit card wale aapke B2B portal wale Amazon wale Flipkart wale B2B B2C wale kitne call karte hai mam hum to call pe hi lage rehte hai mai to khud frustrated hu phone maine chhod diya aapko baat meri baat nahi manunga modern banda hu lekin Samsung ka guru phone use karta hu button wala itna pareshan hu phone se.
Executive: Sahi baat hai sir aapki bilkul baat sahi hai.
Customer: Yaar fake wo phone bhi rakhte hai unka phone kaat do to 10 10 baar phone karte hai mai aapka example du ek mere Manisha madam hai maine teesra phone aaj aaj subah se abhi tak teesra phone hai ye unko malum hai ki char baar ye bande ne complaint bata di par bhi fir bhi Manisha mam teesri baar call kar rahe hai usi vyakti ko are yaar samjha rahe hai hum call cut kar rahe hai means we are not interested to talk.
Executive: Sir sir sir.
Customer: Mai agar kisi ko phone kar du call cut rahe hote na mai zindagi mein usko unko phone nahi karu.
Executive: Sir sir meri baat sun lijiye meri baat sun lijiye aapki baat bilkul thik hai just abhi IndiaMART ke number se aapko call aayega mere senior ka please answer kar lijiye thik hai.
Customer: Kya bolu unko meri baat suno maine jo dialogue ye bola hai ye sare ke sare copy paste kar do that's it aap please unko ye bol do ki mujhe saat buylead chahiye mere paas itna time nahi hai mai aapko explain karu unko unke senior mere paas time nahi hai.
Executive: Sir sir sir dekhiye unko explain karne ki koi need nahi hai already unhone complaint aapka pada hua hai isliye senior maine try kar rahe hai aapko sir unka aapse baat karna bahut zaruri hai samajhiye is cheez ko abhi wo aapko abhi just IndiaMART ke number se aapko call aayega please receive kar lijiye aapke liye bhi bahut zyada.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants only verified buyleads, not quantity.

- Frustrated with spam calls and fake buyleads.

- Does not want to explain issue again.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive requested customer to answer senior's call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to receive a call from senior.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, spam calls, subscription
